page.title: 18THE GOLF COURSE
page.content: Ulverston's golf course takes up a large part of our survey area. It is an 18 hole course with a 9 hole putting green, a driving net with chipping area, and a practice green. You need 6 lessons from the Pro. Mick Smith before you are allowed on the course. There is an 18 month waiting list and following that you are called to a meeting when you are told all about the rules. After that you get a little sticker saying "Member 1985" and when you have completed the 6 lessons and the Pro. thinks you are good enough, he gives you a disc with "Ulverston Golf Club" written on it. You stick the sticker onto the disc, tie the disc to your bag and then you are a full member of the golf club. Lee aged 10.
